name: elliotsawyer/silverstripe-typesense
description: Typesense is Lightning-fast, Open Source Search. No PhD required. Open Source alternative to Algolia + Pinecone + and an Easier-to-Use alternative to ElasticSearch and Solr. Fast, typo tolerant, in-memory fuzzy Search Engine for building delightful search experiences. This enables Silverstripe to work with Typesense collections
